name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: myColors Custom Color Palette by NoCodeMinute

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy easy access to your custom color palette.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your color palette for easy access to copy and paste the colors into your projects. Whether you are building a web app on Bubble or just designing using Figma. Add an unlimited amount of colors to your pallet with labels. Enjoy! You must have an account with www.NoCodeMinute.com/elearning_hub to access.
